item.title: Calendar-like views in Django admin
item.description: In my coding work for SeekHealing, we make extensive use of the Django Admin for our program management database. For a one-person coding team, Django has been invaluable for maintaining a functional, accessible system that evolves with the program’s needs despite the limited number of hours I have to devote to the work. We manage our calendar of program events in Django, with a model appropriately called CalendarEvent, which has a start-time and an end-time - and we’ve got data in this database going back to 2018.
